verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: floated] [ARG1: the idea of holding his planned summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in the Demilitarized Zone] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] on Monday floated the idea of [V: holding] [ARG1: his planned summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-LOC: in the Demilitarized Zone] .
